title: How to get atomic coordinates
description: This notebook shows a way to obtain atomic coordinates from xyz files. We can calculate bond lengths, bond angles, coordination numbers, and so on from atomic coordinates. Some of them might be able to be used as good features.   Reading geometry files Reduced coordinates Geometrical properties
description_lemmatized: notebook show way obtain atomic coordinate xyz file calculate bond length bond angle coordination number atomic coordinate might able used good feature reading geometry file reduced coordinate geometrical property
